languages.text: {n}Они жмутся по углам, устрашенные моим кровавым танцем. Они больше не помышляют о мятеже — лишь о том, как остры мои ножи.{/n}
{n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Они жмутся по углам, устрашенные моим кровавым танцем. Они больше не помышляют о мятеже — лишь о том, как остры мои ножи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}They huddle in corners, terrified of my blood-dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of how sharp my knives are.{/n}
{n}They huddle in corners, terrified of my blood-dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of how sharp my knives are.{/n}
{n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood-dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of keenness of my blades.{/n}
{n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood-dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of keenness of my blades.{/n}
{n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}
{n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie kauern sich in den Ecken zusammen, aus Furcht vor meinem blutigen Tanz. Sie denken nicht mehr an Rebellion, nur noch an die Schärfe meiner Klingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie kauern sich in den Ecken zusammen, aus Furcht vor meinem blutigen Tanz. Sie denken nicht mehr an Rebellion, nur noch an die Schärfe meiner Klingen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se agazapan en las esquinas, aterrados por mi baile sangriento. Ya no piensan en rebelarse, solo en el filo de mis dagas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se agazapan en las esquinas, aterrados por mi baile sangriento. Ya no piensan en rebelarse, solo en el filo de mis dagas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らは隅の方で身を寄せ合い、私の血の舞に怯えている。もはや反逆という思考は抜けて、私の刃の鋭さしか頭にない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らは隅の方で身を寄せ合い、私の血の舞に怯えている。もはや反逆という思考は抜けて、私の刃の鋭さしか頭にない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有人都蜷缩在角落里，对我的鲜血之舞充满恐惧。他们已经不再去想暴乱的事情，只会想到我的匕首有多么锋利。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人都蜷缩在角落里，对我的鲜血之舞充满恐惧。他们已经不再去想暴乱的事情，只会想到我的匕首有多么锋利。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ils se recroquevillent dans les coins, terrifiés par ma danse de sang. Aucun d'eux ne songe plus à se rebeller. Seul compte désormais le tranchant de mes lames.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ils se recroquevillent dans les coins, terrifiés par ma danse de sang. Aucun d'eux ne songe plus à se rebeller. Seul compte désormais le tranchant de mes lames.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kan dansım karşısında dehşete düşmüş hâlde köşelerde toplanıyorlar. Artık akıllarından isyan değil, yalnızca kılıçlarımın keskinliği geçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, terrified of my blood dance. They no longer think of rebellion, only of the keenness of my blades.{/n}
